name: BigJokerBidWhistCardGame
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: big joker
des: Bid Whist players often brag about who is the best. This skill scientifically determines who is most skilled. Bid Whist allows players to play the same hands and see who wins the most games. Since the games are the same, it is no longer subjective who is the best player. Alexa will host the competition. Come start playing now and solidify your place in the Bid Whist hall of fame!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
